A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a long time Star Wars fan\, I was disappointed.

Although Force Awakens wasn't my favorite movie\, I felt that JJ Abrams did a fantastic job setting up this new franchise.  

I left feeling that age-old heroes had been misused while newer characters like Snoke and Phasma were underutilized.  

Also\, misplaced humor was a sore spot for me. Historically\, Star Wars has had great comedic timing... This was too much.

I'm no expert movie reviewer but I know this doesn't deserve a top remarks in terms of great films.
